body: @2665358694 I'm fully aware that this is a paid only work..not that I give a damn. As talented as the artist is, I'm glad to be able to view their work for free. I never would have otherwise.

the artist who create this work named "雪ノ岚と异端丶" comes from China , this work the limit content which meams you need to pay for it and never spread. but it have been sold for a long time. 
PIXIV: https://www.pixiv.net/users/17305623
BIILIBILI: https://space.bilibili.com/2140986/
and you can support him through these two websites:
AIFADIAN: https://afdian.net/@kyuso379
FANSBOX: https://www.pixiv.net/fanbox/creator/17305623
@khangbahuy Aifadian, right. It seems similar to Patreon. But I've no idea how I'd be able to use it.

@Quality Fun beside he uploaded on a chinese website which required you to pay with something else not visa or mastercard. that is why even though i know where he uploads his works but i can't get to them
@NotAClone Well, that's certainly some shitty news to ruin my hopes and dreams. I'm surprised that no one's uploaded them anywhere after over a year despite their presumed popularity.

@Quality Fun I learned the other 2 are different artists, tho their style is similar. Longbow Flintlock's 2 lost Honkai doujins were only available for a limited time and he doesn't seem willing to upload them again.
Kinda unexpected someone buy and put it on this site. I don't have visa too buy it so this is a great find. (・o・)(・o・)

@Quality Fun well you can use Visa or Mastercard to pay for it, i used Visa to buy from that site all the time, works fine, and about the job, it's not that big of a problem 'cause it's a part time job, i can find another one or sign up to grab, uber or something alike, time flexible and i kinda like that

@khangbahuy Sorry to hear you lost your job. The art looks alright, but I wish he'd draw something other than bondage. And he's selling his works from a Japanese website? Ugh, more conversion? No idea how I'd pay for them even if I had the money to since none of it would be yen!
well the art is good as you can see but the artist only show a few pages of the doujin so only someone buy it or you buy it yourself, but i think it's good though

@Quality Fun here you go:
https://arashitiitan.booth.pm/items/3143765?utm_source=pixiv&utm_medium=promotion&utm_campaign=pixiv-promotion&utm_content=work-all_items this is honkai
https://arashitiitan.booth.pm/items/3218722?utm_source=pixiv&utm_medium=promotion&utm_campaign=pixiv-promotion&utm_content=work-all_items this is genshin
well both is about 12$ each makes it 24$ but i'm broke now, lockdown so i can't go to work, or precisely finding new work to do since i lost my job because of the pandemic lol

@khangbahuy That’s completely understandable, since I'm similarly unable to buy the ones I want. Could you at least provide links to the two doujins you're referring to to see whether they're any good? And could you describe how you were able to buy this one? The artist is Chinese and presumably only accepts yuan, so did you need to convert your money to yuan to buy this?
there we go, now i'm in a money problem because of the lockdown in my city so i'm not gonna buy 2 other released manga of this artist right now

This must be khangbahuy's upload. The madlad actually did it. Excellent. Now if only the others (you know which ones I'm talking about, NotAClone) would do the same. It's not that I'm unwilling to pay for them, but that I'm physically incapable of doing so at the moment.
